cont.entity_a: Offers nearly wired-level accuracy, enhancing gaming experiences.

Ergonomics.comm: Comfortable to use with good ergonomics.

cont.entity_b: Some users find the mouse heavy and uncomfortable for long periods.

cont.entity_a: Includes two batteries, allowing for seamless swapping without docking. Rapid battery depletion during gaming. Battery life is short, requiring frequent swaps. Frequent battery swaps can be annoying, despite the quick-change feature.
cont.entity_b: Battery life is excellent, lasting months with auto-shutoff feature. Good battery management with long life and easy swaps.

cont.entity_a: Ability to change tracking speed on the fly is appreciated.
Issues with WiFi interference affect performance.
cont.entity_b: Receiver placement affects performance; must be close for optimal function. Occasional stutter issues resolved by moving the receiver closer.

cont.entity_a: Durability concerns with left button wear and scroll wheel issues.

cont.entity_b: Suitable for general and graphic design use. The mouse provides additional controls like speaker volume, useful for gaming. Good value for the price with a modern look.

cont.entity_a: The battery system allows continuous use without downtime. Some find the battery charging setup inconvenient.
Customer service from Logitech is noted as lacking by some users.

cont.entity_b: Some features, like email and IM buttons, may not work with all applications. Compatible with various operating systems without extensive setup.
